title: Paul's punchy sloppy joe recipe
ingredients: ['For the sauce', '180ml of tomato ketchup', '4 tablespoons of barbecue sauce', '1 1/2 teaspoons of sunflower oil', '1/4 teaspoon of salt', '1/4 teaspoon pepper', '1 teaspoon of mustard powder', '1/2 a teaspoon of garlic granules', 'Remaining ingredients', '400g of minced beef', '1 medium birds eye (or other variety) chilli, chopped (optional)', '1 small onion, chopped', '8 sesame seed buns (two per person)', '125g of grated apple-wood smoked cheese (optional)']
